[docs]def commas(N):
    digits = str(N)
    assert (digits.isdigit())
    result =''
    while digits:
        digits, last3 = digits[:-3], digits[-3:]
        result = (last3 + ',' + result) if result else last3
    return result




[docs]def money(N, width=0):
    sign = '-' if N < 0 else ''
    N = abs(N)
    whole = commas(int(N))
    fract = ('%.2f' % N)[-2:]
    format = '%s%s.%s' % (sign, whole, fract)
    return '$%*s' % (width, format)
